items.name: dasdwasdwasdaw
items.desc: tps to epstein island

items.name: Player ESP
items.desc: Show player names, roles, health and distances through walls.

items.name: Dropped Gun ESP
items.desc: Highlight dropped guns with distance readout and tracers.

items.name: Tracers
items.desc: Draw tracers to players or objects from configurable positions.

items.name: Boxes / Corners
items.desc: Draw square or corner boxes around players with outlines.

items.name: Health Bar
items.desc: Show a vertical health bar next to player boxes.

items.name: Highlight
items.desc: Add highlight adorners with configurable fill/outline transparency.

items.name: ESP Options
items.desc: Toggle names, roles, health text, distance, tracer thickness and max distance.

items.name: Fly
items.desc: Fly in any direction with configurable speed and mobile support.

items.name: Noclip
items.desc: Disable collisions to move through geometry.

items.name: Infinite Jump
items.desc: Allow repeated jumping without touching the ground.

items.name: Walkspeed / JumpPower
items.desc: Adjust movement speed and jump power with sliders.

items.name: Disable Void
items.desc: Prevent falling into the void by teleporting to safe Y-levels.

items.name: Anti-Fling
items.desc: Attempt to neutralize fling attacks from other players.

items.name: Kill Aura
items.desc: Automatically attempt melee kills on nearby players when holding the knife.

items.name: Kill All
items.desc: Attempt to stab all non-lobby players by moving them into melee range.

items.name: Target Kill
items.desc: Select a player and attempt a single targeted kill.

items.name: Auto TP to Gun
items.desc: Briefly teleport to nearby gun drops to pick up the gun automatically.

items.name: Auto Shoot Murderer
items.desc: Attempt to automatically shoot the murderer using prediction and optional legit checks.

items.name: Auto Shoot Mode
items.desc: Switch between 'Blatant' and 'Legit' firing behaviors for different aggression levels.

items.name: Kill Murderer
items.desc: Attempt a focused shot or server-side fire to eliminate the murderer.

items.name: Player Fling
items.desc: Flings an targeted player chosen in the dropdown.

items.name: Fling Targeting
items.desc: Choose a player target from a dropdown and refresh the player list.

items.name: Stop Fling
items.desc: Stop any ongoing fling thread instantly.

items.name: Fling Prediction
items.desc: Adjust prediction/prediction time used when computing fling positions.

items.name: Coin Autofarm
items.desc: Tween to coins and collect them automatically; includes lobby-safe freezing.

items.name: Tween Speed
items.desc: Set the speed (studs/sec) used when tweening to coins.

items.name: Fullbright
items.desc: Force bright ambient lighting for improved visibility.

items.name: No Fog
items.desc: Disable fog and other atmospheric effects.

items.name: Custom FOV
items.desc: Set a custom camera FOV value while enabled.

items.name: Role Tracking
items.desc: Track murderer/sheriff/hero and display them in the UI.

items.name: Role Notify
items.desc: Notify (UI or chat) when roles are assigned at round start.

items.name: Toggle Sounds
items.desc: Enable or disable toggle/notify sounds in the UI.

items.name: Debug Mode
items.desc: Enable debug logging and notify events for troubleshooting.

items.name: Unload Script
items.desc: Safely unload the script and restore default settings.

items.name: Speed
items.desc: Increase movement speed with smooth controls.

items.name: Noclip
items.desc: Move through geometry without collision.

items.name: Infinite Jump
items.desc: Allow repeated jumps without falling.
